Recent Publications

Advances in malaria pharmacology and the online guide to MALARIA PHARMACOLOGY: IUPHAR review 38

Armstrong JF, Campo B, Alexander SPH, Arendse LB, Cheng X, Davenport AP, Faccenda E, Fidock DA, Godinez-Macias KP, Harding SD, Kato N, Lee MCS, Luth MR, Mazitschek R, Mittal N, Niles JC, Okombo J, Ottilie S, Pasaje CFA, Probst AS, Rawat M, Rocamora F, Sakata-Kato T, Southan C, Spedding M, Tye MA, Yang T, Zhao N, Davies JA. (2023) Br J Pharmacol. Online ahead of print. doi: 10.1111/bph.16144.

Chronic liver diseases: From development to novel pharmacological therapies: IUPHAR Review 37

Borrello MT, Mann D. (2022) Br J Pharmacol. Online ahead of print. doi: 10.1111/bph.15853.

IUPHAR Review CXIII: Nuclear Receptor Superfamily - Update 2023

Burris TP, de Vera IMS, Cote I, Flaveny CA, Wanninayake US, Chatterjee A, Walker JK, Steinauer N, Zhang J, Coons LA, Korach KS, Cain DW, Hollenberg AN, Webb P, Forrest D, Jetten AM, Edwards DP, Grimm SL, Hartig S, Lange CA, Richer JK, Sartorius CA, Tetel M, Billon C, Elgendy B, Hegazy L, Griffett K, Peinetti N, Burnstein KL, Hughes TS, Sitaula S, Stayrook KR, Culver A, Murray MH, Finck BN, Cidlowski J (2023) Pharmacol Rev. PHARMREV-INR-2021-000436. doi: 10.1124/pharmrev.121.000436. Online ahead of print.

International Union of Basic and Clinical Pharmacology. CXII: Adenosine Receptors: A Further Update.

IJzerman AP, Jacobson KA, Müller CE, Cronstein BN, Cunha RA (2022) Pharmacol Rev. 74: 340-372.

Publication list

Celebrating >20 years of Servier support

Servier, a mid-size French Pharmaceutical company, has a long history in pharmacology, and has supported NC-IUPHAR for >20 years with unrestricted educational grants which have permitted the Paris meetings and thus progress of the database.
